properties.title: Upload data to analyse on S3 storage
properties.author: Laurent Jourdren

section.name: Upload data to analyse on S3 storage
section.p: This command upload data to analysis on Amazon Web Services S3 storage. Before uploading the design file can be obfuscated if the design.obfuscate global parameter is enabled. To upload data on AWS, you must set the AWS credentials in global parameters of your parameter file or in a configuration file.

ul.li:
Mandatory parameters:
ParameterValueDescription
parameter pathstringThe path to parameter file to use
design pathstringThe path design file to use
data path on S3stringThe path where upload data on S3

Usage:
$ eoulsan.sh s3upload param.xml design.txt s3://my-bucket/test
